reviewText:
Awesome episode.  Great sound and animation.  Always amazes me how they combine the jokes for kids and the jokes for adults in one smooth cartoon.

Kids love the songs in this one.  The toddler loves to dance with us to the "Christmas time again" song.
Love veggie tales.  This one great with Uncle Si character.  Found for great price here on Amazon.  Kids loved it.

I got this for my 3.5 year old daughter and it was her Christmas favorite this year(and she still wants to watch it). I was a teenager when the first VeggieTales came out, so they are not new to me. I wanted to share a fun safe choice for Christmas that would talk about the true meaning of Christmas in a way my daughter would understand. This video was perfect to aid in teaching her about Christmas. And I found it didn't get annoying like so many children's shows do nowadays. I highly recommend it!
One of my 3 year old's favorite Veggie Tales.  Great story too, showing what Christmas is really all about!
Love love love veggietales!! My daughter loves the songs and the characters. What we love about veggietales is they explain the bible in a practical way.
